scripts.build: browserify src/main.js src/controllers/*.js src/directives/*.js src/services/*.js -t [ babelify --optional runtime ] --outfile app/scripts/riken.js
scripts.watch: watchify src/main.js src/controllers/*.js src/directives/*.js src/services/*.js -t [ babelify --optional runtime ] --outfile app/scripts/riken.js -v
